16.name: Skale Slayer
16.description: It's not polite to eat the dead.

21.name: Axe Master
21.description: It's not the prettiest weapon in the armory, but it slices beautifully.
21.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a axe.

82.name: The Cost of Victory
82.description: You faced your worst fear and emerged triumphant.
82.requirement: Complete the personal story step "A Sad Duty," "Delivering Justice," or "Liberating Apatia."

306.name: Repair Master
306.description: If they damage it, you repair it.

337.name: Dispelling Shadows
337.description: How do you pronounce Aatxe, anyway?
337.requirement: Close the portals opened by the shadow behemoth in less than 20 seconds.

339.name: Cleanup Crew
339.description: Fifty percent ogre, fifty percent steam, one hundred percent unexpected.
339.requirement: Find and defeat the misplaced steam ogre in the Thaumanova Reactor.

364.name: Pumpkin Carving
364.description: Made in the Mad King's own image.
364.requirement: Find pumpkins all around Tyria and carve them.

438.name: Daily WvW Invasion Defender
438.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in World versus World.

479.name: Story Dungeon Completer
479.requirement: Complete a dungeon on story mode difficulty.

589.name: Southsun Volunteer Fieldwork
589.description: Assist Researcher Levvi by collecting samples around Southsun Cove.

605.name: Subdirector NULL Demolitionist
605.description: Defeat Canach's golem, Subdirector NULL, in Canach's Lair.

674.name: Weeping Cache
674.requirement: Loot the Aetherblade Cache in the Tears of Itlaocol in Caledon Forest.

676.name: Aether Apprehender: Tyria
676.requirement: Kill Aetherblades in any location across Tyria.

783.name: Balloon Booster
783.requirement: Complete any event on behalf of a hot-air balloon pilot.

826.name: Emissary Vorpp's Field Assistant
826.requirement: Complete all of the achievements necessary to re-create one of Scarlet's portals.

834.name: Friend of Fire and Frost
834.requirement: Completely stop one of Scarlet's portal attacks in Gendarran Fields.

886.name: Here Be Dragons!
886.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter  times.

920.name: Not in Charge Anymore
920.description: There's a sudden opening in the Aetherblade chain of command.
920.requirement: Defeat Foreman Spur in the Twilight Assault dungeon.

1116.name: Tower Antitoxin Injector
1116.requirement: Inject  dose of antitoxin to into the heart of the tower.

1137.name: Tower Nemesis
1137.requirement: Kill  different factions of Scarlet's minions anywhere in Tyria.

1191.name: Horrik's Horror
1191.description: Horrik hit hard, but you hit harder.

1196.name: Molten Furnace Fractal Stabilizer
1196.description: Some folks can take the heat without even sweating.
1196.requirement: You've completed the Molten Furnace fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1263.name: That Wintersday Ring
1263.requirement: Take part in the Wintersday Bell Choir.

1266.name: Making Some Wintersday Friends
1266.description: Wintersday always brings out the crowds.
1266.requirement: Build five snowmen using magic snow dispensers hidden throughout Tyria.

1319.name: Boss Thumper III
1319.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1329.name: Boss Thumper XIII
1329.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1351.name: Boss Thumper XV
1351.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1379.name: Check Out These Guns
1379.requirement: Control the statuary and fire the super cannons.

1516.name: No More Magic; No More Poison
1516.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch

1688.name: Birthday—Year 8
1688.description: You have a character that is more than 8 years old.

1732.name: Chaos Weapon Collection
1732.description: <c=@flavor>These weapons are made of pure chaotic energy. Proper hand protection is recommended.</c>
1732.requirement: Unlock all  Chaos weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1770.name: A Royal Tradition
1770.requirement: Complete a round of Mad King Says.

1777.name: Tricks and Treats
1777.requirement: Collect and use  traditional Tyrian Halloween tricks and treats.
1777.locked_text: Use an Old Pillowcase, found in Trick-or-Treat Bags.

1787.name: Not Under My Command
1787.requirement: Find Caithe's squad without losing any of your soldiers.

1849.name: Daily WvW Land Claimer
1849.requirement: Claim land for your realm in World versus World.

1851.name: Daily WvW World Ranker
1851.requirement: Gain World Rank in World versus World.

1889.name: Daily Urmaug's Secret Jumping Puzzle
1889.requirement: Complete the Urmaug's Secret jumping puzzle in Lion's Arch.

1931.name: Daily Maguuma Vista Viewer
1931.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
1931.requirement: View a vista in one of the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

1967.name: Daily Diessa Plateau Event Completer
1967.requirement: Complete events in Diessa Plateau in Ascalon.

2048.name: Generous Harvest
2048.requirement: Find and use the Gift of Magnanimity.

2098.name: Daily Guardian or Ranger Winner
2098.requirement: Win  PvP match as a guardian or ranger.

2155.name: Honorary Rata Novan
2155.description: You became the Citizen of Tomorrow, today!
2155.requirement: Participate in every stage of building Rata Novus back up.

2225.name: No More Time
2225.requirement: Complete the trial of wits without gaining any bonus time.

2314.name: Heart of Thorns Act I Mastery
2314.requirement: Complete all  Heart of Thorns Act I achievements.

2335.name: Scrap Rifle Field Test: Gold
2335.requirement: Kill as many chak as you can before the timer runs out, but be careful—your scrap rifle is prone to overheating! Destroying chak eggs will release a goo that will heal you and cool your rifle if you are close by, but it's likely to stir up the chak.

2382.name: Sanctum Scramble: Gold
2382.requirement: Jump, launch, and glide your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2577.name: Bitter Harvest
2577.requirement: Pursue friends and foes deep into the jungle stronghold.

2687.name: Continuing Your Ascension
2687.description: Play in ranked matches to advance achievements.
2687.requirement: Complete meta-achievement Path of Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.

2723.name: League Slayer—Elite
2723.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory.

2741.name: Advance Your Ascension
2741.description: Play in ranked matches to advance achievements.
2741.requirement: Complete the meta-achievement Path of Ascension II: Tapestry of Sacrifice.

2763.name: Timekeeper Weapon Collection
2763.requirement: Unlock all  Timekeeper weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2806.name: Firecracker Finder
2806.requirement: Find and light all of the firecrackers in the Crown Pavilion.

2821.name: Seimur Was Wrong
2821.requirement: Complete the final encounter while your entire party is under the effects of tasty Bloodstone Bisque.

2830.name: The Shield
2830.requirement: Liberate the Salvation Pass prison camp with zero civilian casualties.

2860.name: The Storm Wizard
2860.requirement: Unlock all  Storm Wizard weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2879.name: Mineral Resource Extraction 102
2879.requirement: Dig up three bauble chests in World 1, Zone 2 of Super Adventure Box.

2884.name: Course Work: Super Adventure Festival
2884.requirement: Complete three daily achievements in Super Adventure Box. Completion will earn progress in the Course Load achievement, located in the Super Adventure Box: Nostalgia achievement tab.

2958.name: Daily Tier 2 Cliffside
2958.requirement: Complete Cliffside at fractal scale 26 or higher.

3008.name: Out of the Wrong Hands
3008.requirement: Successfully stop the Inquest from capturing  ley-line coalescences.

3072.name: Mantle Pieces
3072.requirement: Defeat  bloodstone-crazed White Mantle in Bloodstone Fen.

3091.name: Bloodstone Weapon Collection
3091.requirement: Unlock all  Bloodstone weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3114.name: Coliseum Gladiator
3114.requirement: Defeat  player during Eternal Coliseum rated matches.

3188.name: Stay Unfrosty
3188.requirement: Battle the ice beast without being frozen.

3198.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 61
3198.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3248.name: Snowball Mayhem Participant
3248.description: Your hands must be freezing by now.

3370.name: Ascended Spirit
3370.requirement: Earn glory in Spirit Watch by completing these achievements.

3392.name: The Real Raiders of Tyria
3392.requirement: Defeat every encounter in Bastion of the Penitent on both Normal and Challenge Mote difficulties.

bits.text: Defeat Cairn the Indomitable Challenge Mote difficulty.
Defeat the Mursaat Overseer on Challenge Mote difficulty.
Defeat Samarog on Challenge Mote difficulty.
Defeat Deimos on Challenge Mote difficulty.

3458.name: Daily Tier 4 Shattered Observatory
3458.requirement: Complete Shattered Observatory at fractal scale 76 or higher.

3472.name: The Flow of Magic
3472.description: Journal: The Flow of Magic Completed
3472.requirement: Power up the shrines of Orr.

3631.name: Small Victory (Epilogue)
3631.requirement: Speak to the people of Amnoon.

3720.name: The Throne of Bones
3720.description: Palawa Joko's throne of bones lies deep within the Bone Palace. His builders aren't very creative...

3752.name: Renowned Adventurer: Domain of Vabbi
3752.requirement: Complete all of the renown hearts located in the Domain of Vabbi.

bits.text: Help the royals of Vehjin Palace.
Aid the Awakened in the Vehjin Mines.
Disrupt the Forged occupying the Foundry.
Help the living and the dead at the Necropolis.
Help the students of Vehtendi Academy.
Be the life of the party.
Assist the Lyssan Fools acting troupe.

3861.name: Goddess of Secrets
3861.requirement: Find Kormir's secret room within the library.

3863.name: Ley of the Land
3863.requirement: Speak with Ela Makkay about surging magical energy.

3929.name: Craving Quaggan
3929.requirement: Donate enough pieces of candy corn to get Drooburt through the day.

3943.name: Mad Mementos
3943.requirement: Track down firsthand accounts of Mad King Thorn's rule during Halloween, when the Mad Realm draws near.

bits.text: Stories yet untold despite the tower that marks a spooky site. When humans flee their home of old, where they settle cannot be told.
This hinterland village was home to a goddess and a martyr.
These old bones are caught in the gullet, where laughing rises from sorrow.
The landing at Arca struggles to fill its storeroom so it will never starve again.
Green is the color I want to remember. Not the red of flames or the blackened plateau. The bridge, even it was green.
Walk in cadence with King Thorn's shattered subjects. They keep their hatred deep within.

3963.name: Daily Domain of Istan Renown Heart Completer
3963.requirement: Complete all three renown hearts in the Domain of Istan.

3989.name: Sunk Cost
3989.description: Sometimes the gold isn't worth it.
3989.requirement: Destroy each of the three Corsair ships during the Palawadan raid.

4019.name: Istani Bounty Hunter
4019.requirement: Complete all five bounties in the Domain of Istan.

4155.name: Another Hundred Lives
4155.requirement: Donate enough Continue Coins to help get Drooburt out of his tough spot.

4161.name: Mini Griffon Hatchling Collection
4161.requirement: Unlock all griffon hatchling miniatures in your wardrobe.

4274.name: Master of the Four Winds
4274.requirement: Complete all achievements in the Labyrinthine Cliffs and the Crown Pavilion.

4314.name: Watchknight Wrecker
4314.requirement: Destroy  disguised watchknight in the Crown Pavilion.

4324.name: Flame Legion Finisher
4324.requirement: Kill  Flame Legionnaire in the Crown Pavilion.

4363.name: If I May Interrupt
4363.description: More like Palaver Joko, am I right?
4363.requirement: Interrupt every single recruitment speech by the Monument to the Return of Palawa Joko.

4404.name: Taking Turns
4404.requirement: Defeat Qadim without the same person being sent into the lamp twice.

4420.name: Requiem: Experiment 3
4420.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4433.name: Crystal Attunement
4433.description: "Strange sounds. I hear them in my dreams." —Naja
4433.requirement: Collect all the Branded crystal samples that Naja requires.

bits.text: Obtained from Branded humans, charr, and ogres in Jahai Bluffs.
Obtained from powerful Branded Awakened in Jahai Bluffs.
Obtained from Branded hydras and Forgotten in Jahai Bluffs.
Obtained from Branded djinn in Jahai Bluffs.
Obtained from Branded devourers and earth elementals in Jahai Bluffs.
Obtained from Branded Riftstalkers in Jahai Bluffs.
Obtained from the Shatterer in Jahai Bluffs.

4493.name: Scion & Champion
4493.requirement: Prove the strength of your bond with Aurene.

4501.name: Carry the Creator
4501.requirement: Complete a raid boss with an ArenaNet employee.

4520.name: Chasing Tales: Cruelest Efficiency
4520.description: Baverne never hesitated to take an advantage when offered.
4520.requirement: Afflict 30 enemies with vulnerability while wielding a rifle.

bits.text: Afflicted 30 enemies with vulnerability while wielding a rifle in Thunderhead Peaks.

4604.name: A Different Kind of Shatterer
4604.requirement: Break 10 soldiers out of Brand crystals in the Deldrimor ruins.

4606.name: Chasing Tales: Tried and True
4606.requirement: Defeat 60 enemies while wielding a sword and a shield in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 60 enemies while equipped with a sword and shield in Thunderhead Peaks.

4669.name: Salt on the Wound
4669.requirement: Successfully inflict 10 wounds on Kralkatorrik during The End.

4698.name: Daily Dragonfall Olmakhan Base Builder
4698.requirement: Upgrade the camp in the shard of the Underworld by completing events in the area.

4710.name: Skyscale Stealth
4710.requirement: Play hide-and-seek with your skyscale in Sun's Refuge.

bits.text: Complete the hide-and-seek minigame on easy.
Complete the hide-and-seek minigame on medium.
Complete the hide-and-seek minigame on hard.

4732.name: Daily Dragonfall Bridge Builder
4732.requirement: Build or defend 3 bridges in Dragonfall.

4737.name: Sniper's Nest
4737.requirement: Be within earshot of Zafirah when she starts picking off enemies.

4739.name: Daily Dragonfall Burning Forest Creature Slayer
4739.requirement: Kill 25 creatures in the Burning Forest in Dragonfall.

4793.name: Demigod of the Arena
4793.requirement: Finish the season in 2nd place on the skill rating leaderboard.

4875.name: (Annual) Bandits' Bane
4875.requirement: Kill  bandit in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4921.name: Master Concert Promoter
4921.requirement: Finish the concert with maximum hype.

4925.name: Untouchable
4925.description: Story Instance: A Race to Arms
4925.requirement: Defeat the icebrood construct without being struck by any spiral ice bombs.

4997.name: Extra Life Community Goal
4997.requirement: Return to Lion's Arch after the community reaches the $ goal.

5034.name: Shadows Creep
5034.description: You saw something in West Bjora Marches, though you're not sure what...
5034.requirement: Witness the twisted happenings within West Bjora Marches.

5041.name: Bjora Marches Insight: Ravenfrost Caverns
5041.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in Bjora Marches.

5062.name: Ice Try
5062.requirement: Find the fraenir within 5 seconds after he obscures himself.

5071.name: Daily Bonus Rewards: Toypocalypse
5071.requirement: Win the tenth round of the Toypocalypse.

5293.name: Special Mission: Clear the Overlook
5293.requirement: Defeat  Dominion charr in Petraj Overlook in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5304.name: Special Mission: Fired Up
5304.requirement: Assist with activating flame shields at the overlook or port  times.
5304.locked_text: Unlock by using Flame Legion Special Mission Documents.

5325.name: Tengu Weapon Etchings
5325.requirement: Make a weapon etching from each curious carving.

5381.name: The Ox's Yoke: Silver
5381.requirement: Complete the Ox's Yoke adventure with a silver or better ranking.

5396.name: Drizzlewood Coast Insight: Frost Citadel
5396.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5399.name: Special Mission: Explosive Situations
5399.description: <c=@flavor>"I was told there's never a red wire in real life...but these clearly have red wires!"</c>
5399.requirement: Defuse  Dominion mines in the Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

5433.name: God of WvW
5433.description: I've been in the Mists for countless lifetimes.
5433.requirement: Reach Rank 10,000 in World vs. World, and then purchase the God of WvW title from the Legendary Vendor in World vs. World.

5553.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Twenty-Five
5553.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Five.

5574.name: Daily Snowden Drifts Dragon Response Mission
5574.requirement: Complete the Snowden Drifts Dragon Response Mission.

5603.name: Favored of the Celestials
5603.requirement: Earn a medal in each event of the Celestial Challenge.

5632.name: Kodan Supporter
5632.requirement: Purchase  Kodan Supply Box at the Eye of the North.

5740.name: Woodland Management: Bitterfrost Frontier
5740.requirement: Log wood  times in Bitterfrost Frontier.

5771.name: Return to Confessor's Stronghold
5771.requirement: Complete the mission Confessor's Stronghold in Living World Season 3 Episode 1.

5782.name: Reconquer the Retrospective Runaround
5782.requirement: Complete the Retrospective Runaround jumping puzzle in Sand Dune Caverns in the Silverwastes.

5808.name: Woodland Management: Silverwastes
5808.requirement: Log wood  times in the Silverwastes.

5817.name: Treasure Hunter: Silverwastes 1
5817.requirement: Find and open  buried bandit chest in the Silverwastes.

5826.name: Woodland Management: Draconis Mons
5826.requirement: Log wood  times in Draconis Mons.

5869.name: Return to Drizzlewood Coast 1
5869.requirement: Complete  Return to No Quarter achievements.

5881.name: Return to What's Left Behind
5881.requirement: Complete the story mission What's Left Behind in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 1.

6034.name: League Conqueror—2v2 Season Five
6034.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Five.

6128.name: New Kaineng Insight: Salvage Yard
6128.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6193.name: Not Too Worse for Wear
6193.requirement: Prevent Bei Fung's mechs from dropping below 90% health during a patrol.

6220.name: Ministry-Approved Willbender
6220.requirement: Purchase these  trinkets from the strike rewards vendor.

6240.name: Competent Commander
6240.description: A good commander knows the situation at all levels of the conflict and how his soldiers are performing.
6240.requirement: Check in with representatives of all allied forces in Dragon's End while placing extractors.

6318.name: Tagging the Tag
6318.requirement: Find the marker for the Aetherblade cave.

6340.name: Jade Shadow
6340.description: The Kestrels might have to make room in their ranks.
6340.requirement: Complete Kage's special mission parameters inside the Jade Brotherhood camp.

bits.text: Speak to Kage to receive further instructions.
Locate the Jade Brotherhood supply cache.
Examine the Jade Brotherhood supply cache.
Locate and steal a source of arcane fire from the Speakers.
Return to the supply cache in the Jade Brotherhood camp.
Destroy the supply cache using the arcane flame to implicate the Speakers.

6342.name: Kaineng Fisher
6342.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6342.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of Kaineng.

bits.text:
Found in the waters of New Kaineng City.

Favored Bait: Any

6389.name: New Kaineng Insight: Jade Monument
6389.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6390.name: Ministry-Approved Bladesworn
6390.requirement: Purchase these  trinkets from the strike rewards vendor.

6396.name: Ocean-Fresh Sashimi
6396.requirement: Help Sakda and Miju complete their deliveries in New Kaineng.

6464.name: Jumping Training
6464.description: You will jump up to that platform every day so that it becomes second nature. From there, you'll find even higher places to jump. Do this, and one day, you'll look down and realize how far you've come.
6464.requirement: Successfully reach the top of the jumping beams course in the training grounds.

6482.name: Clear the Canals
6482.requirement: Destroy  flotsams with your boat in New Kaineng City.

6553.name: The Battle for Cragstead
6553.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Battle for Cragstead.

6723.name: Decade of Adventure: Kryta
6723.requirement: Complete  events in the Kryta region.

6780.name: Against the Alliance 2
6780.requirement: Stabilize Diessa Plateau against the Molten Alliance by completing events and returning audio logs to Agent Brandubh. Molten Alliance events award extra progress.

6915.name: Loaded for Demon
6915.requirement: Fully charge the battery at the sniper scaffold during the final battle of Gyala Delve.

6931.name: Entrapment
6931.requirement: Trap and defeat the ravenous wanderer.

7002.name: Echovald Wilds Rift Hunting
7002.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Echovald Wilds.

7090.name: Island Discovery Tour
7090.requirement: Visit all of the floating fractal islands and learn about each one.

bits.text: While earning your place with the Rift Hunters, head out to explore the islands of Skywatch Archipelago.
Learn about the fractured ruins of Devastated Garenhoff.
Learn about the utopian underground of Rata Novus Promenade.
Learn about the untamed jungle of Primal Maguuma.
Learn about the technological dystopia of Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03.
Learn about the ravaged sands of Skyward Marches.
Learn about the historical monument of Droknar's Light.

7120.name: Rift Hunter Armor
7120.requirement: Earn the Rift Hunter Armor set by by completing the Secrets of the Obscure story journal.

7142.name: Straits of Devastation Rift Hunting
7142.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Straits of Devastation.

7163.name: Cosmic Observatory Strike Mission
7163.requirement: Complete the Cosmic Observatory Strike Mission.

7201.name: Unseen Invasion
7201.description: What you can't see can indeed hurt you.
7201.requirement: Complete tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunts in Skywatch Archipelago and Amnytas. Each awards varying levels of progression.

7375.name: Dungeon Delver: Ascalonian Catacombs
7375.requirement: Complete any path of the Ascalonian Catacombs dungeon.

7606.name: Daily PvP Rush Victor
7606.requirement: Win a PvP match. This achievement resets each day.

7689.name: Frode's Journal
7689.requirement: Find Frode's journal pages around the Horn of Maguuma.
7689.locked_text: To unlock, complete the story chapter Duress.

bits.text: Find in Forgotten Path where a wanderer was last seen scurrying off with one.
In Heitor's Domain, near a circular door.
Find in the Bleeding Wastes, hanging on some rocks.
Purge Lyhr of Kryptis corruption in Skywatch Archipelago.
Assist the Astral Ward with Mosaic Wrath in Amnytas.
Return to Frode at Wizard's Respite in the Wizard's Tower.

7787.name: Emotional Barrier
7787.description: "I'll try to pretend I'm sad or something."
7787.requirement: Use an emote to power the barrier generator during the "Wreak havoc in the Fortress of the Founding" event.

7809.name: Illuminating Inner Nayos
7809.description: Is it ever dark in the Realm of Dreams?
7809.requirement: Transfer power to  lanterns at points of interest in Heitor's Territory and Nyedra Surrounds.

7846.name: Not Like This Again
7846.description: It's a good thing there isn't another Mastery insight here. Still, it would have been easier than, say, jumping up the Mad King's Clock Tower backward.
7846.requirement: Use the /cower emote at the top of the tallest extractor in the Defiled Cradle...or close enough to the top.

8002.name: Sanctum of Rall Veteran
8002.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8003.name: Borlis Pass Veteran
8003.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8046.name: Amnytas Supply Run: Silver
8046.description: Doing the supply run pretty well, most of the time.
8046.requirement:
Earn a silver medal in the Amnytas Supply Run.

(Progress will update when you claim the rewards from this adventure.)

8115.name: Sunken Treasure Week: First Dive
8115.requirement: Find and open any sunken chest.

8211.name: Janthir Syntri Insight: Stricken Cathedral
8211.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Janthir Syntri.

8230.name: Lost in the Fight
8230.description: You're overcome with excitement! The thrill of a good fight! Go! Go! Go!
8230.requirement: Use the /cheer emote while watching a fight in the arena.

8253.name: Hide-and-Seek: Gold
8253.requirement: Earn a gold medal in Hide-and-Seek.

8259.name: Forager's Hunt Renown Mastery
8259.requirement: Help the kodan around their camp to gain their favor.

8398.name: Reconquer the Displaced Tower (Weekly)
8398.requirement: Complete the displaced tower jumping puzzle in Jahai Bluffs.

8421.name: Return to Path of Fire
8421.requirement: Complete  achievements from the Return to Path of Fire event.

8460.name: Mists Vault: Visitor's Pass
8460.description: I wonder how big this place really is...
8460.requirement: While visiting the Mists Vault after purchasing a Legendary Weapon Starter Key from the Wizard's Vault, speak with Field Archivist Cierle about future visits.

8594.name: Mistburned Barrens Insight: Valley of Agony Mirror
8594.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Mistburned Barrens.

8611.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Auric Basin
8611.description: We have protected Tarir for over a century. Its decorations will be yours today.
8611.requirement: Complete events in Auric Basin. Group events will award more progress.

8620.name: Silence the Screaming
8620.requirement: Banish Yagon from Tyria before she completes her foul ritual.

8642.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Lake Doric
8642.description: My house—my homestead—is all I have left now.
8642.requirement: Complete events in Lake Doric. Group events will award more progress.

8643.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Grothmar Valley
8643.description: And that's how it's done! If you want to decorate like the commander...train harder!
8643.requirement: Complete events in Grothmar Valley. Group events will award more progress.

8689.name: Adventurous Spirit: Skiff Races
8689.requirement: Complete laps of any skiff race event or adventure in Cantha.

8712.name: Evidentiary Standards
8712.requirement: Gather all evidence of White Mantle activity while locating the touchstones.

8723.name: Unknown Nightmares: Gift of Shadows
8723.requirement: This collection can be a useful reference for what is needed for each gift to create Orrax Manifested.

bits.text: Purchased from unusual coin vendors in Mistburned Barrens and Bava Nisos.
Purchased from a Mystic Forge vendor for Spirit Shards.
Earned by completing events in Mistburned Barrens.
Earned by completing events in Bava Nisos.

8740.name: Assorted Chaos
8740.requirement: Intentionally sort a text into the wrong category.

8748.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Ura: Gold
8748.requirement: Earn gold-rank timing in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8760.name: Foundry Survivor
8760.requirement: Survive all encounters in the Foundry of Failed Creations without being downed.

8775.name: True Introvert
8775.requirement: Pet the cat at the party and leave without socializing with anyone.
